name: New Driving Tuk Tuk Hill
description:
New Driving Tuk Tuk Hill is full of thrill with pick and drop passenger on the beautiful mountain track. This rickshaw game is not easy that you thinking you have to drive on the difficult mountain area. You have to drive carefully and open your eye when you driving if you made any mistake then rickshaw will fall down from mountain and game will be over.
Features:
- Off road adventurous and thrill game.
- With beautiful rickshaw model.
- Real stunning environment.
- Multiple camera views.
- Totally free to play.
- Simple and smooth control.
